Name: Fimbul Winter
About the game: FimbulWinter is a first-person horror game in a scandinavian style. The game revolves around a hermit who just try to survive. But the last winter has begun and he needs to survive in this open-world full of dangers that is a unique combination of first person shooter, survival horror, tower defense, and role-playing games. Game Features: - A big map with a variety of beautiful landscapes and landmarks based on real-life locations. - Take over a ruin, or build from the ground-up. - Explore and build during the day. Defend your base at night. Craft weapons and tools.
Meta Title: Fimbul Winter: May 6, 2021, Success Games and Full Overview
